errors.error_description: Installing BigBang with pip before creating and activating the virtual environment
correction_candidates: Move 'pip install ".[dev]"' to after virtual environment activation
Create virtual environment first, then activate it, then install dependencies
Remove the pip install command from before venv creation entirely
Change the order to: clone, create venv, activate venv, then install
errors.golden_answer: Move 'pip install ".[dev]"' to after virtual environment activation
